thread.title: Stayed with a group, wouldn't come back
thread.title_full: Stayed with a group, wouldn't come back - Review of Novotel Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mlsearles
title: Stayed with a group, wouldn't come back
text: I stayed here on a group tour. While the beds are comfortable, the rugs are disgusting and dirty. There are spots everywhere throughout the halls and rooms. The amenities are sparse, my complimentary water was opened when I arrived, my stir sticks for coffee and plastic cups were never replaced. One of my light bulbs was out in the bathroom and I notified the front desk the first day; it was never fixed. The buffet breakfast is a cattle call with a 30 minute wait. The bartenders were friendly but drinks were pricy and small (and yes I realize drinks in Paris are not cheap.) When I come back to Paris, I will definitely stay at something more upscale and clean.
